level.heading: Transition provisions; establishment of Interim Board of Directors.
Legislative History of Law 10-188
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-188, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 10-1201.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-142
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-142, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 10-1202.08a.

level.heading: Effective Dates
level.text: For effective date of D.C. Law 12-142, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 10-1202.01.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Pub. L. 105-227, § 2, Aug. 12, 1998, 112 Stat. 1515, provided: "Notwithstanding section 602(c)(1) of the District of Columbia Home Rule Act, the Washington Convention Center Authority Financing Amendment Act of 1998 (D.C. Act 12-402) shall take effect on the date of the enactment of this Act."
